name: Totask2
tagline: project time logging web application - showcase for java8 & springMVC.
body:
### Welcome to totask2.

a simple show case for some common application libraries.

SpringMVC web application in Java 8 using some closures https://java.com/de/[java]. 
Templating Engine is thymeleaf. 

_client side_ http://getbootstrap.com//[bootstrap^] css, 
http://bootstrapvalidator.com/[bootstrapvalidator^] for client side validations, 
http://jquery.com/[jquery^] as JavaScript library, adding http://www.datatables.net/[datatables^] as datagrid.
Charts are done with http://www.chartjs.org/[Charts.js^].
Autocompletion with REST/json using http://jqueryui.com/autocomplete/[autocomplete plugin^].

Basic _reporting_ with http://community.jaspersoft.com/project/jasperreports-library[JasperReports^].

_peristance_ done on http://www.h2database.com/[h2^], migrations (DDLs) done by http://flywaydb.org/[flyway^].
_documentation_ with http://asciidoctor.org/docs/asciidoc-writers-guide/[asciidoc^] markup. 

_Build management_ by http://www.gradle.org/[gradle^], adding some plugins like
checkstyle, pmd, findbugs, asciidoctor, flyway

### Authors and Contributors

@man-at-home
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
